pullRequest.title: [Transform] add new exclude_generated flag to GET transform
pullRequest.bodyText:
This adds a new flag exclude_generated for GET transform API.
This flag is useful for when a transform needs to be cloned within a cluster or exported/imported between clusters.
It removes certain fields that are not able to be set via the PUT api (e.g. version, create_time).
relates #63055

commit.message: [Transform] add new for_export flag to GET transform

nodes.bodyText: for source it would be nice to omit the default match_all query, we added it there for visibility, for export it would be nice to remove it. For that we need to pass the params here.

"certain fields" is a bit vague
"Exclude fields automatically added to the configuration when the transform is created."
nodes.diffHunk:

 (Optional, integer)
 include::{es-repo-dir}/rest-api/common-parms.asciidoc[tag=size-transforms]
 
+`exclude_generated`::
+(Optional, boolean)
+Indicates if certain fields should be removed from the configuration on

nodes.bodyText: nit: this could be done with an or and 1 if
